title: 外語專業學生從事的工作趨勢 （全英講座） Exploring Career Paths for Foreign Language Major Students（ English Lecture ）
author: 鄭海樂
content:
分類： 其他公告
來源： 國際事務處 - 鄭海樂 - hesp@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話5173
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生
標題： 外語專業學生從事的工作趨勢 （全英講座） Exploring Career Paths for Foreign Language Major Students（ English Lecture ）
日期： Thu, 2 Nov 2023 13:58:10 +0800

一、活動宗旨：在當今國界日益模糊、文化日益多元的環境中，多元的語言政策可能成為衡量國家競爭力的新指標。本講座將深入探討外語技能在現今職場的價值，並分享外語專業在不同領域的應用，分析外語領域的新興趨勢，引導學生發現他們的興趣和優勢，提供選擇職業方向的建議。提供更多機會給學生參與國際學習，同時協助他們內化這些國際學習的經驗，結合當地觀點和經驗，培養學生的國際行動力和批判性思維能力，進而使他們不僅在學問上具有博雅的素養，同時也具備了更強的就業競爭力。

Event Objectives: In today's increasingly interconnected and culturally diverse world, multilingual policies may emerge as new indicators for measuring a country's competitiveness. This seminar will delve into the value of foreign language skills in the modern workplace, share the applications of language expertise in various fields, analyze emerging trends in the field of languages, guide students in discovering their interests and strengths, and provide career direction advice. It will offer students more opportunities for international learning while helping them internalize these international experiences, integrating local perspectives and experiences to cultivate students' international mobility and critical thinking skills. This, in turn, equips them not only with a broad education but also with enhanced employability.
